channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-mock (0.4)
item.description: Provides checking for non-existent mock methods
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-json (23.7)
item.description: JSON Formatting Reporter plugin for Flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (23.6)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi stub files.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-django-migrations (1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to lint for backwards incompatible database migrations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-plugin-utils (1.3.7.4)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-plugin-utils

item.title: Updated: flake8-isolated-packages (2.2)
item.description: This Flake8 plugin is for checking imports isolations.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-plugin-utils (1.3.3)
item.description: The package provides base classes and utils for flake8 plugin writing
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-annotations-complexity (0.0.8)
item.description: A flake8 extension that checks for type annotations complexity
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-variables-names (0.0.6)
item.description: A flake8 extension that helps to make more readable variables names

item.description: Flake8 noqa comment validation

item.description: This flake8 plugin is for checking imports isolations.

item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you wrap code with visual balance.

item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you wrap code with visual balance.

item.title: Updated: pytest-flake8-path (1.4)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (2.6)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.

item.title: Updated: flake8-comprehensions (3.13)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tidy-imports (4.9)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you write tidier imports.

item.title: Updated: flake8-2020 (1.8.1)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (23.6.5)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: wemake-python-styleguide (0.18)
item.description: The strictest and most opinionated python linter ever

item.description: Python linter to check TODO comments for consistency and best practice.

item.description: Flake8 plugin to forbid backslashes for line breaks
